title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 496.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 496.1 - Purpose

State Regulations
(a) This Part
adopts limits on the emissions of greenhouse gases from across the State and
all sectors of the State economy for the years 2030 and 2050, as a percentage
of 1990 emission levels of 60 percent and 15 percent, respectively, as
established in the Climate Leadership and Community Protection Act, chapter 106
of the Laws of 2019. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
496.1

Adopted

New

York State Register December 30, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 52, eff. 12/30/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
